name: Hats and Hammers
description:
Hats and Hammers is a co-op action game made for Chillennium 2019, a 48-hour game jam hosted at Texas A&M. The theme for the jam was "One for All, All for One."

The game revolves around you and your friends protected a group of villagers from incoming swarms of monsters. However, you can't attack, and must rely on the villagers to defeat the monsters. Instead, it is your job to make sure the villagers stay alive and that the buildings don't fall apart from the attacks. Work together with your friends and villagers to protect the village!

The game runs on Windows, and supports 1-3 players with XBOX controllers.
